radiographic_examinations.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. The liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation with no focal lesions. Normal pancreas without focal lesions or ductal dilatation. Spleen normal size and attenuation. Normal adrenal glands. Slight cortical thinning in the left kidney with bilateral low-density renal lesions consistent with cysts. Stomach, small bowel, colon, and rectum are unremarkable. Prostate enlarged. No lymphadenopathy noted. No abdominal aortic aneurysm.
